articles.title: Oil gains as Russian output cuts offset rising U.S. inventories By Reuters - Investing.com
articles.description: Oil gains as Russian output cuts offset rising U.S. inventories
articles.content:
By Ron Bousso
LONDON (Reuters) -Oil prices extended gains for a second session on Friday as the prospect of lower exports from Russia offset rising inventories in the United States and concerns over… [+2244 chars]

articles.title: A health insurance policy that locks your premiums till you make a claim - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Niva Bupa launches a health policy that allows you to carry forward your unutilised sum assured and locks your premium at the age you buy the policy
articles.content: Private standalone health insurance company Niva Bupa on February 23 rolled out ReAssure 2.0, a health insurance product with features such as carry forward of the unused sum insured and renewal prem… [+3882 chars]
